function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vibrant local manufacturing as an enabler of resilient economy","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases due to increased human interaction in manufacturing facilities","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and health protocols, provide adequate personal protective equipment, and enforce social distancing measures in manufacturing facilities","Technologies":"Use of contactless technology, automation, and remote monitoring in manufacturing processes","People":"Workers in manufacturing facilities, local community members","Owner":"Local governments, manufacturing businesses"},{"Description":"Behavioural change in consumers","Impact":"Risk of transmission of contagious diseases through shared consumer spaces and interactions","Mitigation":"Encourage online shopping, implement contactless payment systems, and ensure regular cleaning and disinfection of consumer spaces","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online shopping platforms, monitoring and disinfection technologies","People":"Consumers, retail workers","Owner":"Retail businesses, local governments"},{"Description":"Diversification and circularity of supply chains","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through multiple touchpoints in supply chains","Mitigation":"Adopting digital supply chain management, reducing physical touchpoints through automation, and enforcing health and safety guidelines for supply chain workers","Technologies":"Digital supply chain platforms, automation technologies, monitoring and tracking systems","People":"Supply chain workers, logistics personnel","Owner":"Supply chain companies, logistics businesses, local governments"}]}
